word:
It is the duty of those who stand as leaders and teachers of the people to instruct members how to labor in missionary lines, and then to see in operation the great, grand work of proclaiming widely this message which must arouse every unworked city before the crisis shall come, when, through the working of satanic agencies, the doors now open to the message of the third angel shall be closed. God requires that we shall give the message of present truth to every city, and not keep the work bound up in a few places. Wherever an opening for the truth can be found, there let men be stationed 


                             -216- 

who are capable of presenting its teachings with a power and conviction that will reach hearts.
